page.title: 07THE CUMBERNAULD CENTRE
page.content: The most important part of the area is the{Town Centre.}All the main {shops, offices and public services} are located here, within easy reach from all parts of the town. It is a multi_level building, carefully designed to create a {pleasant and {safe environment}for its users eg. the shops are enclosed to protect the shoppers in bad weather and it is a{pedestrian centre}within which traffic is not allowed. The types of shops vary from small grocers and tobacconists to large department stores and supermarkets. There are also a number of banks and building societies and various offices of the {Development Corporation.}In the evening it becomes the{entertainment {centre}of the town with entertainments such as bingo, pubs and restaurants attracting people to the area.
